Text.Page:
I can make an extremely potent antidote, but most find it distasteful. It tastes so awful, those who drink it say they would rather die if they ever become poisoned again.

Be that as it may, many find the ingredient gathering more distressing than the taste. I hope you're up to the task. I'll need the eyes of the garangkas those {@LinkCreature:5#1#Tuwangi Overseers} ride around on. Yes, just the eyeballs.
I was hoping you'd bring me bigger ones, but these will do for now. Here, I know it wasn't easy.
Bring me the eyes of the garangkas that the {@LinkCreature:5#1#Tuwangi Overseers} ride around on. They aren't going to roll here themselves.
